long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prowallet is a browser based wallet extension to interact with the Cardano blockchain.

Prowallet allows to store and send multiple assets, delegate to stake pools and much more.

Private keys associated with users wallets are stored only on a users computer and they are encrypted with the wallet password. They are not stored on centrally hosted servers.
